articles.author: Alisa Sopova, Anastasia Taylor-Lind
articles.title: Ukraine refugees face uncertainty and precarity as displacement persists - WUSF Public Media
articles.description: Despite being welcomed by European neighbors, for most Ukrainians, it's not enough to build a new life. Many are caught in a cycle of repeated uprooting, displacement and return.
articles.content: At the onset of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the world witnessed a massive exodus of refugees from the country. Photos of exhausted, fearful women queuing at the country's western borders… [+6996 chars]
